h2_title: The Scorpionlord Boss Fight and Guide
content: He can also run toward you and dive into the ground, forcing you to lose your lock on as he waits below ground for a moment before busting out to attack as he erupts forth. Don't get greedy after he appears, as he will usually follow his re-entry with a quick tail swipe that can turn into a grab if it connects, and immediately inject a large dose of poison into you while also dealing massive damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Scorpionlord.md', within the main section titled 'The Scorpionlord', specifically from the subsection 'The Scorpionlord Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can also run toward you and dive into the ground, forcing you to lose your lock on as he waits below ground for a moment before busting out to attack as he erupts forth. Don't get greedy after he appears, as he will usually follow his re-entry with a quick tail swipe that can turn into a grab if it connects, and immediately inject a large dose of poison into you while also dealing massive damage.
